Value.label: Pulse factor
Value.Help: How many pulses are counted per 10 kWh.

Value.label: Sensor type
Value.Help: Defines the meter type on which the Power Reader is placed

Value.label: IR Listen period
Value.Help: Additional time for feedback measurement.Should always be 0.

Value.label: IR Pulse Width
Value.Help: Adjusts transmit signal so received signal will in average be equal to this values. Auto calibration might select another value than this.

Value.label: Poll / Wake up frequency
Value.Help: Wake device up this many times per second. This value also controls number of measurements per second on mechanical meters.

Value.label: Wake up interval
Value.Help: Do not use. Set this value using WAKE_UP_INTERVAL_SET instead.

Value.label: Pulse count
Value.Help: Current pulse count in device (pulse count / pulse factor = kWh).

Value.label: Keep alive period
Value.Help: set to the number of seconds that it will take the controlling node to send a response / request to the wake up notification

Value.label: Real-time mode
Value.Help: Set this to enter real-time mode from remote. Contains seconds * poll frequency before going back to sleep. If you press the button once this value will be set.
